name: From Alimony to Zabaione Quiz | Alphabetical Words | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
acne.

	Or acrimony, Anthony, or Annie.

Britney.

	Or Barney, Brittany, bony, baloney, botany, or bunny.

crony.

	Or calumny, colony, cottony, or calzone.

Daphne & Dodone.

	The daughter of a river god, the nymph Daphne turned into a laurel tree to escape love-sick Apollo who was chasing her. A knowledgeable player informs me that there are more D nymphs: Dione, Dodone, and even Doris! I added Dodone, because this name has 6 letters and ends with the 'knee' sound.

ebony.

	Snow White's hair was as black as ebony. Paul McCartney and Stevie Wonder sang a song together called 'Ebony and Ivory' about piano keys and racial harmony.

funny.

	Or felony or finny.

gluttony.

	Gluttony is one of the Seven Deadly Sins. The other six are sloth, wrath (anger), lust, avarice, pride, and envy.

questions.text: A sweetener or a term of endearment?
questions.explanation:
honey.

	Or hackney or hegemony.

ignominy.

	Can't think of any more, can you?

jenny.

	Or jitney.

kidney.

	Or Kenny or knee.

larceny.

	Or litany.

questions.text: Stuck a feather in his cap and called it _______.
questions.explanation:
macaroni.

	Or many, Minnie, Melanie, mutiny, or muttony.

ninny.

	Or nanny.

oogeny.

	Or orogeny (process of mountain formation) or ontogeny (development of an individual organism).

puny.

	Or pony, penny, peony, phony, palimony, or Parsippany, New Jersey.

questions.text: I'm skipping Q. The opposite of hard-cooked (eggs)?
questions.explanation:
runny.

	Or Ronnie.

spumoni & spumone.

	Or sunny or Sony.

tony & toney.

	Or tinny or tortoni (another kind of Italian ice-cream).
unfunny.

questions.text: First name of John Travolta's character on 'Welcome Back, Kotter'?
questions.explanation:
Vinnie & Vinny.

	Vinnie Barbarino.

whinny.

	Or Whitney or whiny.

questions.text: (Sorry, guys.) The supposed production of offspring that are completely different from the parents?
questions.explanation:
xenogeny.

	Got it from the Scrabble dictionary.

yogini.

	Or yoni (a Hindu symbol for the vulva) or Yanni (a New Agey musician with floppy hair).

zany.

	Zabaione (or zabajone) is an Italian dessert--it's often warm, it's frothy and custardy, and it often has some kinda Italian liquor in it. It's delicious! Then there's Zuni (a Native American people) and Zambone (a machine that makes an ice rink smooth again after skaters' blades gouge its surface full of grooves and scrapes).
